sentences.sContent: These processes are called anabolism and catabolism.
sentences.sContent_eng: These processes are called anabolism and catabolism.
sentences.sCn: 这些过程叫作合成代谢和分解代谢。

sentences.sContent: Both anabolism and catabolism are necessary for survival and good health.
sentences.sContent_eng: Both anabolism and catabolism are necessary for survival and good health.
sentences.sCn: 合成和分解代谢在对于身体健康很重要。

sentences.sContent: Anabolism is when energy is created and stored, and catabolism is when energy is released.
sentences.sContent_eng: Anabolism is when energy is created and stored, and catabolism is when energy is released.
sentences.sCn: 合成代谢是生成和储存能量，而分解代谢则是能量的释放。

words.tran: 使异化；使发生分解代谢

trans.tranOther: a metabolic process in which complex molecules are broken down into simple ones with the release of energy; destructive metabolism
